title: Game Crashing after Champion Select
body: This has happened on and off in the past week or so. I enter champ select everything works fine then after champ select is over the game crashes and i cant reconnect. It was working fine until about a week ago where it would work sometimes and then crash sometimes but once it starts crashing it carries on for awhile. Because of this i have also accumulated 4 20x5 minute bans in 3 days and i just entered a ranked game after it working fine for awhile then the game decided to crash and im probably going to get another ban. Someone please help me.

replies.body: Im bug splatting out on a Desktop pc, been running window's 10 on it 6months now, and it only recently started bug splatting after last league patch.

I may have found a solution, but it only works for those on Nvidia right now, go into Geforce experience, into theGames and then click the Details where you would optimize the game, set it to a pixel resolution that works on your screen, then change it to Windowed, bordeless. It worked for me.
same problem does anyone know how to fix this

I'd like to help but need some more information on what you mean by crashing.  For example, are you bugsplatting?  Are there any error messages and when exactly is it happening?  In the meantime, if you recently updated Windows 10, some players have had crashing issues due to a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disable this and try it out in a custom game.  Let me know!
